message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $120. I believe it's a fantastic deal and will be valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product, which is a fair price for both of us.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but I can't sell it for less than $100. It's still a great price considering its value.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $100 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $90, which is a good compromise for both of us.
